title: Bug 5707Display.setAppName() has no effect on XDisplay application name
description: Bug 5707Display.setAppName() has no effect on XDisplay application name
OB: APPNAME defaults to "SWT" which is always used, even if 'appName=Eclipse' isspecified in the product.ini. The problem is that the X display is openedbefore display.setAppName() is applied.
